price: Oni govore: “Hej ti kome se Kur’an objavljuje, ti si uistinu lud!
arabic: وَقَالُواْ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِي نُزِّلَ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلذِّكۡرُ إِنَّكَ لَمَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqālū yāayyuhā alladhī nuzzila ʿalayhi al-dhik'ru innaka lamajnūnun
